title: Platinum 3 ADC LFT
body:
im Apeksu a Plat 3 ADC looking for a team to play and develop with, with success we can climb ranked 5's and maybe compete in the OOL, i can play any ADC and adapt to team comps accordingly but im strongest at playing some meta and hard carry ADC's like {{champion:119}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:15}}  but can play others if needed
message me if interested, thanks

replies.body: added u on lol with my smurf
